texts.content: <outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[末世降临，城市变成了一片废墟]</font></color></size></outline>

<outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[一个男孩在残垣断壁间奔跑]</font></color></size></outline>

<outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[他的脚步急促而坚定]</font></color></size></outline>

<outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[他的眼神中闪烁着不屈的光芒]</font></color></size></outline>

<outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[仿佛在寻找着希望的火种]</font></color></size></outline>

<outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[身后是熊熊燃烧的火焰]</font></color></size></outline>

<outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[他却毫不畏惧]</font></color></size></outline>

<outline color=(0,0,0,1) width=0.08><size=7><color=(1,0.87059,0,1)><font id="6740435892441190919" path="C:/Users/shiyi/AppData/Local/JianyingPro/Apps/4.2.0.10100/Resources/Font/新青年体.ttf">[勇往直前，展现出一种顽强的生命力]</font></color></size></outline>
